weekly_top_story.headline: Tropical Storm Melissa poised to become a hurricane, threatening northern Caribbean with torrential rain and flooding
weekly_top_story.summary: Tropical Storm Melissa is forecasted to strengthen into a hurricane, posing a serious risk of massive rainfall and life-threatening flooding across the northern Caribbean region, highlighting increasing climate vulnerability.

stories.headline: U.S. and China say trade deal drawing closer ahead of Trump-Xi high-stakes meeting
stories.summary: As President Donald Trump prepares for a critical meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping, both countries indicate progress toward a trade agreement, potentially easing long-standing global economic tensions.

stories.headline: Russia launches new powerful weapons, sending a clear global warning
stories.summary: Russia unveiled and deployed advanced new weapons systems, signaling a strategic escalation that may impact global military balance and diplomatic relations.

stories.headline: Russian missile and drone attacks in Ukraine kill four and wound 20 amid ongoing conflict
stories.summary: Intensified Russian attacks in Ukraine have resulted in civilian casualties and continue to exacerbate the already severe humanitarian and geopolitical crisis in the region.
